title: Befriending Your Inner Voice
description: You know that negative voice that goes round and round in your head, keeping you up at night? When that negative inner voice gets switched on, it’s hard to think about anything else. Psychologist Ethan Kross has a name for it: chatter. In this favorite conversation from 2022,  we talk with Ethan about how to keep our negative emotions from morphing into chatter. Our podcast subscription, Hidden Brain+, is now available across devices and podcast platforms. You can join on either Apple Podcasts or via our Patreon page. Thanks for your support of the show — we truly appreciate it!
author: Hidden Brain Media
excerpt: Stitcher is the easiest way to listen, download, and discover podcasts for free across iOS, Android, Web, and more. Access exclusive podcasts from your favorite hosts with Stitcher Premium.
